sub_topic: Finding the area of a parallelogram.
message_1: A parallelogram has a base of 9 cm and a height of 6 cm. Find its area.
message_2:
To find the area of a parallelogram, we use the formula:

Area = base × height

In this case, the base is 9 cm and the height is 6 cm. So, we can plug these values into the formula:

Area = 9 cm × 6 cm = 54 cm²

The area of the parallelogram is 54 square centimeters.
